flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: The P4 Adapter kit from Modern Device provides a RS232 serial-port connection to a BBB or RBBB. It has the reset (RTS) line on it, and supports the BBB or any other Modern Device Board with the RTS-capacitor hack installed.
guide.title: P4 Adapter Kit
